itemDescription: M.A. Fellow and Tutor of Queen's College, Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas William Allen,  (9 May 1862 – 30 Apr 1950) was an English classicist, scholar of Ancient Greek and palaeographer. He was a fellow of The Queen's College, Oxford, from 1890 until his death sixty years later. He is best known for his editions of Homer for Oxford Classical Texts and work on Greek Palaeography.
